extensionDescription.message: This extension allows you to watch YouTube videos that are blocked for your region.

workingToFindAMirrorMessage.message: F*ck Youtube is trying to unblock this video...

loadingMessage.message: This process shouldn't take more than a few seconds.

noVideoFoundMessage.message: F*ck Youtube tried but couldn't unblock this video. Sorry

popupMessage.message:
The extension is up and running.

Just relax and enjoy it.

As soon as you access a YouTube video that is blocked for your region, the magic will happen!

warningMessage.message:
The extension unblocks only videos that are blocked for your region.

This video may have been deleted or is private.
